The first part is the topic sentence for a single idea. for example, the fair will have not only a snake charmer from Malaysia but also acrobats from China and Bollywood actors from India.&nbsp; Finally, a large number of booths will offer fairgoers a wide variety of international crafts, which will make a perfect gift for that special someone.&nbsp; It is part of a longer piece of writing that includes a full paragraph as a conclusion.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<p><img alt=\"A diagram shows the 2 parts of a body paragraph in a longer piece of writing.  The first part is the topic sentence for a single idea. The 2nd part is the supporting details for the topic sentence. They do not need concluding sentences.<br />&nbsp;</p>"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your next step is revising.&nbsp; When you are revising, make sure&nbsp;each&nbsp;body paragraph meets these&nbsp;criteria:<br />&nbsp;</p><ul style=\"padding-left: 15px;\"><li>covers just one of the ideas that is mentioned in the introductory paragraph</li><li>starts with a topic sentence that names the idea</li><li>has enough details to support the topic sentence</li><li>includes details that all stick&nbsp;to the topic</li><li>transitions smoothly from the paragraph before it</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Revising a body paragraph"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>When you review the first body paragraph, you decide that it meets the criteria, but that you have forgotten to include a detail from your original blog post!<br /><br /><span class=\"ju-examples\" style=\"color:#552656;font-family:tahoma;\">Experts in Somalian cuisine will offer insight into how to cook with the versatile lentil bean.&nbsp; </span><br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>You add those details.&nbsp; Each body paragraph has plenty of details to support your topic sentence.<br /><br />You add an introductory paragraph and a conclusion and repost your blog post.&nbsp; You are rewarded with many &quot;likes&quot; and &quot;shares&quot;!<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":0,"showHeader":1,"hideRightPanel":1,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>There are key&nbsp;differences between a single, standalone paragraph and a group of&nbsp;body paragraphs for&nbsp;an essay or longer piece of writing.&nbsp;</p><table border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-table\" style=\"width: 90%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">&nbsp;</th><th scope=\"col\"><strong>Standalone paragraph</strong></th><th scope=\"col\"><strong>Body paragraph</strong></th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><strong>Topic sentence</strong></td><td>gives the topic and main idea, and includes details that let the reader know the writer&#39;s plan</td><td>gives a single idea</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Transition words</strong></td><td>tell the order or importance of ideas within the paragraph</td><td>also provide smooth transitions between paragraphs</td></tr><tr><td><strong>Concluding sentence</strong></td><td>summarizes the paragraph</td><td>not needed</td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Putting it Fair!&nbsp; To be held from noon until 9 p.m. on May 23-25, this celebration of international culture will offer food from all over the world, a wide array of musical performances, and other events too good to pass up!<br />&nbsp;<p>First, the Downtown Street Fair will offer a wide variety of intriguing and delicious foods prepared by devoted cooks and chefs. People from Mexico will demonstrate how tortillas are made.&nbsp; Caribbean natives will show how to cook goat and beef patties, which are a favorite of Caribbean cuisine.&nbsp; French chefs will serve beignets and other French delicacies.&nbsp; Experts in Somalian cuisine will offer insight into how to cook with the versatile lentil bean.</p><p>Next, the street fair also promises a celebration of music from around the world. &nbsp;Musicians will perform cumbia music from Colombia.&nbsp; European DJ&#39;s will devote a few hours to playing upbeat trance music and Europop.&nbsp; Brazilian singers will belt out Fado music, which is intended to elicit an intense emotional reaction from listeners.<br /><br />But the fun does not stop there. Performers will wander the streets, wearing the native dress of people from all over the world and displaying their talents; for example, the fair will have not only a snake charmer from Malaysia but also acrobats from China and Bollywood actors from India.&nbsp; Finally, a large number of booths will offer fairgoers a wide variety of international crafts, which will make a perfect gift for that special someone.&nbsp;</p><p>Clearly, the fair has something for everyone.&nbsp; The Downtown Street Fair will be held from noon until 9 p.m. on May 23-25, on Maple Avenue between 18th and 20th Streets.&nbsp; Save the date, and bring your friends and family!</p><p>&nbsp;</p></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null}],"overviewHeader":"Overview","inputData":{"mc_68f3e093-97fc-ac2d-f6b1-03d66aaef05e":{"displayType":"MC","noOfChoices":3,"selectdTry":2,"selectedColumn":1,"choices":[{"text":"body paragraphs","fixed":false,"correct":false},{"text":"introductory paragraph","fixed":false,"correct":false,"incFeedback":"A longer piece of writing has just one introductory paragraph."},{"fixed":false,"correct":false,"text":"concluding paragraph","incFeedback":"A longer piece of writing has just one concluding paragraph."},{"fixed":false,"correct":false,"text":""},{"fixed":false,"correct":false}],"selectedTry":2,"correctFeedback":"A longer piece of writing typically has more than one body paragraph.
